title: John Setka's wife pleads guilty to drink driving
text:
The wife of embattled construction union boss John Setka has admitted driving at more than five times the legal alcohol limit on Boxing Day in regional Victoria.

Emma Walters, 43, faced Horsham Magistrates Court on Thursday accompanied by her husband and pleaded guilty to drink driving after returning a blood-alcohol reading of 0.282 while doing 128km/h in a 100 zone on the Western Highway.

"She was extremely ashamed of what she had done," a clinical psychologist told the court.

Emma Walters (right) and husband CFMEU Victorian secretary John Setka arrive at Horsham Magistrates Court. AAP

Dr David List said he had been treating the couple since May.

Barrister John Lavery, acting for Walters, said she had been handling "life stresses" at the time of the driving offence.
description: Emma Walters' barrister said she was suffering from life stresses when speeding at over five times the legal alcohol limit on Boxing Day.
